title: Peachtober 2020
subtitle: Miscellaneous
greetingText: Every October I like to join the Inktober challenge. In 2020, I decided to take the #Peachtober 2020 promts list.
detailsTitle: A drawing challenge, my second attempt
detailsText:
Every year, artists from all over the world join the Inktober challenge of draw a daily drawing throughout the month of October.
To do this challenge, I like to find a list of prompts that help me get inspired. And this year the prompt list that Sha'an d'Anthes (@furrylittlepeach) shared, immediately caught my attention and it was the one I decided to follow.

This is the second edition of Inktober that I have joined. Since I liked the result of the previous year, I decided to apply the same philosophy of challenging myself to learn a new tool, and so I took it as a challenge to learn to draw with a pen tablet.

It was very difficult and challenging for me, but the level of learning I had was also very high and rewarding.
